bug.author: alalek
bug.description:
CMake 3.10 changes behavior of CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM variable. Now it is not available in toolchain file. Related CMake source code changes are <denchmark-link:https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/merge_requests/1317/diffs>here</denchmark-link> :
Find native build tool after determining the target system This will allow toolchain files and platform modules to specify information that affects the selection of the native build tool.
